dataset.title: ğŸ“š About the Dataset
dataset.description: In this workshop, you'll be working with a curated and preprocessed subset of the Public Jira Dataset, originally published by researchers from the University of Hamburg:

exercise-1-llm-configuration.title: ğŸ§™ 1: Connect to Your Magical LLM
exercise-1-llm-configuration.description: Welcome to your first spell in the Testus Patronus journey!

exercise-2-api-knowledge-ingestion.title: âš™ï¸ 2.1. Optional: Ingest Using the API
exercise-2-api-knowledge-ingestion.description: If you want to go beyond manual upload and see how teams can automate the ingestion of Jira issues or JSON exports into Dify, we've built a small API just for that!

exercise-2-knowledge-ingestion.title: ğŸ“„ 2: Build Your Knowledge Base
exercise-2-knowledge-ingestion.description: Welcome to the second step of your Testus Patronus journey! In this exercise, you'll learn how to build a Knowledge Base that your AI assistant can search through using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).

exercise-3-ai-chatbot-setup.title: 3: AI Chatbot Setup
exercise-3-ai-chatbot-setup.description: Welcome to the next step of your Testus Patronus journey! In this exercise, you'll connect your RAG pipeline to your chatbot, enabling it to answer questions using your uploaded knowledge base.

exercise-4-advanced-prompting.title: 4: Advanced Prompting & Relevance Tuning
exercise-4-advanced-prompting.description: Objective: Improve output quality and relevance for software testing queries.

intro.title: ğŸ§™ Introduction to Testus Patronus
intro.description: Welcome to the Testus Patronus workshop! This hands-on tutorial is designed for the EuroSTAR Software Testing Conference, where you'll learn how to build your own AI assistant using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) with a focus on software testing use cases.
